data_table.description: Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, GTS Version A, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: GTSA1
variable.description: Was participant treated for diabetes in visit 3? Q1 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSA2
variable.description: Do you regularly take medication to control diabetes? Q2 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSA3
variable.description: Has participant fasted at least 12 hours? Q3 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSA4
variable.description: Have you had surgery to remove part of your stomach or small intestine? Q4 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSA5
variable.description: Are you willing to participate in the glucose tolerance test? Q5 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, exam 4]
